Container.Name: ankidock
Container.Overview:
My Docker of ankicommunity/anki-sync-server. Testet with AnkiDroid, Anki 2.1.28 (PC) and Anki 2.1.42 (PC and Mac). Working with VPN, DynDNS and behind a reverse Proxy.
Further instructions: https://github.com/lawryder/ankidock
Container.Category: Backup: Cloud: Tools: Other: MediaServer:Other Network:Web Status:Stable
Container.DonateText: I love Ankidock! Go buy yourself a beer!
